subject: Travel
title: Deep-Sea Exploration Today
description: A tiny lesson with a big payoff: Deep-Sea Exploration Today.

hook.text: We've mapped more of Mars than our own ocean floor. Over 80% of the seabed is still unexplored.

buildup.text: Modern submersibles can now reach any depth, carrying cameras and robotic arms.

discovery.text: Victor Vescovo completed the Five Deeps expedition in 2019, diving to the deepest point in every ocean.

twist.text: At the bottom of the Mariana Trench, he found a plastic bag. Pollution had beaten him there.

climax.text: Every dive discovers new species. The deep ocean may hold millions of undiscovered life forms.

punchline.text: The last frontier on Earth is underwater.

quiz.question: What did Victor Vescovo find at the bottom of the Mariana Trench?
